Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Gather remembrances in Bag End ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Lobelia Sackville-Baggins
He leaped in the air, rolled off the table, and then simply vanished!
'How glad I am that old Gandalf, and Strider, and my old friends shall be with me when we go! Though I wonder how far, and where we shall part ways along the path, if it comes to that.'
And even as he swooned, he glimpsed Strider leaping out with a flaming brand...
